experience.title: Core intern
experience.description: TATA Tubes plant at Sahibabad plant is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities run by a highly skilled workforce. The automotive industry is forecast to reach US$ 260-300 billion by 2026. The industry accounts for around 10% of the demand for steel in India. With increasing capacity addition in the automotive industry, demand for ERW tubes from the sector is expected to be robust. Rejection of tubes because of orange peel defect has affected adversely. Based on data of customer rejection of FY-21 and FY-22 rejection of tubes due to this problem was more than 20% one of the top reasons for rejection. I worked on giving practical and cost-effective recommendations to the company using technical knowledge of my core engineering field metallurgy.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: I worked on the project of Fertilizer Subsides and Climate action Research project.This project estimated potential climate benefits and associated co-benefits on social, economic, and environmental dimensions of the creative re-allocation of subsidies for chemical fertilizers towards green manure. We combined data sets on fertiliser use, landholding patterns, wildlife corridors, and carbon emissions from agriculture. The results of this project enabled identification of areas where re-allocation of subsidies from chemical fertilizers to green manure have the highest climate benefits and associated co-benefits.
